alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Lapeer; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of Tuscola, northwestern Lapeer, southern Bay, eastern Saginaw and southwestern Huron Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Pinconning to near Reese to near Montrose. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Reese around 625 PM EDT. Fairgrove and Quanicassee around 635 PM EDT. Frankenmuth and Akron around 640 PM EDT. Vassar and Unionville around 650 PM EDT. Sebewaing around 655 PM EDT. Gagetown around 700 PM EDT. Owendale around 705 PM EDT. Caro and Pigeon around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Arthur, Colling, Wisner, Ellington, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Gilford, Silverwood and Indiantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
